text: If you borrow any USB mics or equipment from conference rooms for events, please return them when you’re finished!
y’all, i’m pretty sure i misplaced my headphone-to-lightning dongle for my phone somewhere around the office. :disappointed:  if you found one, holler @ me dot com.
samantha: i have an extra in the outer pocket of my backpack if you want to borrow
ha! shoot. i realized mine is gone when packing for trip. thx :hugging_face:
